description: A browser-based incremental game exploring sustainability themes. Players balance economic progress against environmental harm (CO2/EVH). Features difficulty levels (Nightmare to Baby mode), tutorial system, achievements, multiple endings, upgrades (Industrial, Eco, Click), active skills (CO2 Shield, Money Boost), black market, city evolution visualization, and audio settings. Retro pixel-art style with Press Start 2P font.
logo: Team 11/Price of Progress ver.1.5~/Price of Progress ver.1.5/images/favicon.png
